sermons.title: A Brand Plucked From the Fire
sermons.description: In commemoration of the 300th anniversary of John Wesley's birth, this message looks at the dramatic sweep of his long life and presents the overwhelming power of God's grace, even in the heart of one who set out by self-devised methods to make himself a Christian. Wesley found that only when he renounced all of his efforts and trusted Christ alone did he enter into the joy of salvation.

sermons.title: Ezra #4: Reasons For An Incomplete Temple, Part 2
sermons.description: What is God's perfect cure to an incomplete temple?  Ed continues to discuss the external reasons for why we may abandon the building of the temple and contrasts those with the real reason why we give up on building the temple.

sermons.title: Overcoming Satan by the Blood of Jesus
sermons.description: Whenever sin creeps in a believer's life, there's  no spiritual authority or discernment and the devil will try to take advantage of it. Prayer and reading the Word of God are necessary, but you must understand how to appropriate the blood of Jesus, how to stand on the accomplished work of the cross when the devil tries to bring you into condemnation or load you down with guilt over your failures. This is the secret of victory. "And they overcame him by the blood and by the word of their testimony, and they loved not their lives to the death." Rev. 12:11. Powerful! A must hear for those who struggle with condemnation and guilt.

sermons.title: Reform or Revival, Which Shall It Be
The Coming Revival of the Joshua Priesthood
sermons.description: September 03, 2006 – This is a message for those who are spirtually dicouraged.For those who are in a place where our life and ministry has been brought to a standstill. Satan has formed an argument against the completeness of Christ and against the certainty od God's promises for every believer. But God speaks out to every demonic power that would come against us and He says " the Lord rebuke you Satan". God has plucked us out of the fire and God has caused our inquity to pass and we were brought into an endless power of His life so that we will glorify Him in the generation.
